<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have no current ranges just add the range and return, otherwise,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// check the current section and CU against the previous section and CU we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// emitted into and the subprogram was contained within. If these are the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same then extend our current range, otherwise add this as a new range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PrevCU)</Highlight></CodeLine>
